message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, $14,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $14,000 is a bit steep for you, but I really think you'll get a lot of value out of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $13,500.
